00018    * Constructor.
00019    */
00020    Perturbation::Perturbation()
00021     : ParamComposite(),
00022       nParameters_(0),
00023       mode_(0)
00024    {}

00027    * Destructor.

00032    /*
00033    * Read parameter(s) and set system parameters.
00034    */
00035    void Perturbation::readParameters(std::istream& in)
00036    {  
00037       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00038       int i, j;
00039       if (hasParamCommunicator()) {
00040          int size = paramCommunicator().Get_size();
00041          int rank = paramCommunicator().Get_rank();
00042          read<int>(in, "mode", mode_);
00043          read<int>(in, "nParameters", nParameters_);
00044          parameters_.allocate(size, nParameters_);
00045          parameter_.allocate(nParameters_);
00046          initialParameter_.allocate(nParameters_);
00047          finalParameter_.allocate(nParameters_);
00048          if (mode_ == 0) {
00049            readDMatrix<double>(in, "parameters", parameters_, size, nParameters_);
00050            for (i = 0; i < nParameters_; ++i) {
00051               parameter_[i] = parameters_(rank,i);
00052            }
00053          } else if (mode_ == 1) {
00054            readDArray<double>(in, "initialParameter", initialParameter_, nParameters_);
00055            readDArray<double>(in, "finalParameter", finalParameter_, nParameters_);
00056            for (i  = 0; i < nParameters_; ++i) {
00057               parameters_(0,i) = initialParameter_[i];
00058               parameters_(size-1,i) = finalParameter_[i];
00059               for (j= 1; j < size-1; ++j) {
00060                  parameters_(j, i) = parameters_(0, i) + j*((parameters_(size-1, i) - parameters_(0, i))/(size-1));
00061               }
00062            }
00063            for (i  = 0; i < nParameters_; ++i) {
00064               parameter_[i] = parameters_(rank, i);
00065            }
00066          }
00067       } else {
00068          parameter_.allocate(nParameters_);
00069          readDArray<double>(in, "parameter", parameter_, nParameters_);
00070       }
00071       #else
00072       parameter_.allocate(nParameters_);
00073       readDArray<double>(in, "parameter", parameter_, nParameters_);
00074       #endif
00075 
00076       setParameter();  // Modify parameter of associated System
00077    }
00078 
00079    /*
00080    * Set the perturbation parameter.
00081    *
00082    * Set the parameter of the associated system.
00083    */
00084    void Perturbation::setParameter(DArray<double> parameter)
00085    {
00086       parameter_ = parameter;   // Set the class member.
00087       setParameter();           // Modify associated System.
00088    }
00089    
00090    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00091    double Perturbation::parameter(int i, int id)
00092    { return parameters_(id,i); }
00093    #endif
00094 
00095    int Perturbation::getNParameters() const
00096    { return nParameters_; }
00097 
00098 }
00099 
00100 #endif
